inputs.label: Execution Mode
inputs.helpMarkDown:
To run in the k6 cloud, you'll have to provide your k6 cloud token as a secret variable with the name `K6_CLOUD_TOKEN`.

Dont have a k6 account yet? Go to https://k6.io/cloud and activate your free trial.
